title: New: Clea – Dire Consequences
body:
Absolutely adored **Clea’s** debut track, Polyester, which showcased real songwriting potential, and this latest offering goes some way to fulfilling that potential.

Dire Consequences has elements of Sharon Van Etten, PJ Harvey and Angel Olsen, all realised in vibrant style. Check it out below.
